actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Beta-cyfluthrin.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend through December 31, 2009, the duty on Reaction mixture comprising the enantiomeric pair (R)-a-cyano-4-fluoro-3-phenoxybenzyl (1S,3S)-3-(2,2-dichlorovinyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate and (S)-a-cyano-4-fluoro-3-phenoxybenzyl (1R,3R)-3-(2,2-dichlorovinyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate in ratio 1:2 with the enantiomeric pair (R)-a-cyano-4-fluoro-3-phenoxybenzyl (1S,3R)-3-(2,2-dichlorovinyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate and (S)-a-cyano-4-fluoro-3-phenoxybenzyl (1R,3S)-3-(2,2-dichlorovinyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate (b-Cyfluthrin) (Beta-cyfluthrin).

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Beta-cyfluthrin.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Beta-cyfluthrin.
